      • getAccountsDirectory

        public java.io.File getAccountsDirectory()
        Returns the accounts directory (where the plugin stores the accounts).
        NOTE : if the directory does not exist, this method will try to create it.
        Returns:
        The accounts directory.

      • getBanksDirectory

        Returns:
        The extensions directory.
